title: JAX vs Keras: Which ml frameworks Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare JAX vs Keras. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between JAX and Keras? Both are popular ml frameworks tools, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: JAX vs Keras
paragraphs: JAX (ml frameworks) is Python library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program transformation, designed for high-performance numerical computing and large-scale machine learning.. It's known for Google, NumPy, GPU.
Keras (ml frameworks) is High-level neural-network API offering fast experimentation on top of TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.. Users choose it for API, Deep Learning, Prototyping.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: JAX: JIT compilation, Automatic differentiation, Vectorization
Keras: Intuitive layer API, Multi-backend support, Pretrained applications

verdict: Both JAX and Keras are excellent AI tools. For ml frameworks, your choice depends on specific needs: JAX for Google, Keras for API.
